name: Click the Button [DEMO]
description:
It's a button, click it! Just do it, everything IS A LIE will be just fine! In all seriousness though, this is the demo for the game "Click the Button", which will be released later this year, here on itch.io! I wanted to make a game based on regret, so here is the first demo! I will be releasing Early Access on mixed-reality.itch.io/button !

Click the Button by Mixed Reality (itch.io)
